headline: Assessing Workday (WDAY) Valuation As High P/E Contrasts With DCF Suggesting Upside Potential
summary: Why Workday stock is on investors’ radar Workday (WDAY) is drawing attention after a period of weaker share performance, with the stock down over the past week, month, past 3 months, and year despite ongoing revenue and net income growth. See our latest analysis for Workday. At a recent share price of US$182.99, Workday’s momentum has been fading, with a 30 day share price return of 16.3% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 27.0%, although the 3 year total shareholder return of 6.1%...
